CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 28, 1953, pg. 30, reads: "'Command Performance' Real-Gone Fun Package; 'Chuck Fly' Flies Right - At 'Command Performance' - When the Program Department of the Centre Avenue YMCA held its third annual 'Command Performance' show at Schenley High School Auditorium Tuesday night as a benefit for the World Service Fund among the top-drawer acts which received loud applause were, left to right: ... the well-known singer and master of ceremonies, Cornell Cooper... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Singer and master of ceremonies Cornell Cooper at microphone, in Schenley High School auditorium for Centre Avenue YMCA annual "Command Performance" show
